Ozzy

Ano: 2016

IMDb ID: tt5770430

Classificação: 5.2

Sinopse: Friendly, peaceful beagle Ozzy has his idyllic life turned upside-down when the Martins leave on a long trip. There's only one problem: no dogs allowed. Unable to bring their beloved Ozzy along for the ride, they settle on the next best thing: a top-of-the-line canine spa called Blue Creek. This picture-perfect place turns out to be a facade constructed by its villainous owner to capture dogs. Ozzy will end up in the real Blue Creek, a prison for dogs, run by dogs. Ozzy must avoid danger and find strength in his new friends, Chester, Fronky, and Doc, to escape the prison and return home safely. The narrative of "Ozzy" aims to follow in the footsteps of movies which employ Pixar-like quality and fun. "Ozzy" is an animated comedy-adventure movie targeted for kids of all ages and represents family entertainment at its best. The story itself is based almost entirely around dogs. "Ozzy" falls into the "prison movie" genre with funny tributes to the great prison classics. It's a story about friendship, loyalty, courage, and the ability to find the best in ourselves when facing a tough situation.
